insert into ${schema}.df_usage ( df_usage_uid, df_usage_batch_uid, wr_wrk_inst, work_title, system_title, status_ind, product_family, standard_number, standard_number_type, market, market_period_from, market_period_to, reported_value, gross_amount, comment,
) select uuid_generate_v4(), #{batchId}, ua.wr_wrk_inst, work_title, system_title, 'WORK_FOUND', 'NTS', standard_number, standard_number_type, market, market_period_from, market_period_to, gross_amount, gross_amount, comment,
from ${schema}.df_usage_archive ua left join ${schema}.df_work_classification wc on ua.wr_wrk_inst = wc.wr_wrk_inst
returning df_usage_uid

with grand_total_divisor_subquery as ( select sum(u.gross_amount * (#{fundPoolPeriodDividend} / (u.market_period_to - u.market_period_from +1))) grand_total_divisor from ${schema}.df_usage u join ${schema}.df_work_classification wc on u.wr_wrk_inst = wc.wr_wrk_inst where u.df_usage_batch_uid = #{batchId} and wc.classification = #{classification} ) select case when grand_total_divisor is not null then round(#{fundPoolMinAmount} * grand_total_divisor / #{fundPoolAmount}, 2) else 0.00 end cutoff_amount from grand_total_divisor_subquery

with work_total_weight_subquery as ( select u.wr_wrk_inst, wc.classification, sum(u.gross_amount * (#{fundPoolPeriodDividend} / (u.market_period_to - u.market_period_from +1))) work_total_weight from ${schema}.df_usage u left join ${schema}.df_work_classification wc on u.wr_wrk_inst = wc.wr_wrk_inst where u.df_usage_batch_uid = #{batchId} group by u.wr_wrk_inst, wc.classification )
delete from ${schema}.df_usage u using work_total_weight_subquery sub where u.df_usage_batch_uid = #{batchId} and sub.wr_wrk_inst = u.wr_wrk_inst and ((sub.classification = 'STM' and sub.work_total_weight < #{stmCutoffAmount}) or (sub.classification = 'NON-STM' and sub.work_total_weight < #{nonStmCutoffAmount}) or (sub.classification is null and sub.work_total_weight < #{unclassifiedCutoffAmount})) returning u.df_usage_uid
